title: Grunty Industries
description: A fairly difficult and hard-to-navigate level.

general.name: Floor 4 Early
general.description: You can shoot a Grenade Egg through the wall to access Floor 4 early.

general.name: Solo Banjo to HFP
general.description: You can glitch walk through the Toxic Waste pipe to enter HFP as solo Banjo.

general.name: Underwater Toxic Waste Jiggy From Wrong Side
general.description: You can grab the Jiggy through the wall while underwater.

general.name: Jump Across Trash Compactor
general.description: You can use solo Banjo's Pack Whack to jump across the Trash Compactors.

cwkshots.name: Toxic Waste Clockwork Shot by Pjii
cwkshots.description: JRL Switch from GI - Pjii's New Method

cwkshots.name: Tintops Jiggy Shot
cwkshots.description: You can shoot a Clockwork to grab the Tintops Jiggy without having to kill them.

cwkshots.name: Weldar Skip
cwkshots.description: You can shoot a Clockwork through the ladder to grab Weldar's Jiggy without having to fight him.

cwkshots.name: Back Door Break-In
cwkshots.description: You can shoot a Clockwork through the back door of GI to press a switch and enter the building.

cwkshots.name: Floor 5 Jinjo Shot
cwkshots.description: You can grab this Floor 5 Jinjo with a Clockwork.

cwkshots.name: Floor 2 Cheato Page Shot
cwkshots.description: You can grab this Cheato Page with a Clockwork.

cwkwarps.name: Quality Control Early
cwkwarps.description: You can use a Clockwork warp to access the Quality Control room.

cwkwarps.name: Break-In
cwkwarps.description: You can Clockwork warp into the main building of GI.
